mapper.select: -- getAttachFileList 첨부파일 리스트 조회 select ATTC_FIL_ID as attcFilId ,SEQ as seq ,FIL_NM as filNm ,FIL_SIZE as filSize ,LAST_MDFY_ID as lastMdfyId from iris_com_attc_fil where attc_fil_id = #{attcFilId} and DEL_YN = 'N' order by seq
-- getAttachFileId select convert(nvarchar(4), getdate(), 112)+RIGHT('00000' + CAST(next value for attch_idx AS VARCHAR(5)), 5) as attcFilId
-- getAttachFileSeq select max(seq) + 1 as seq from iris_com_attc_fil where ATTC_FIL_ID = #{attcFilId}

-- retrieveDrmConfig SELECT A.iCanEdit ,A.iCanSave ,A.iDocOpenCount ,A.iDocPrintCount ,A.iImageSafer ,A.iVisiblePrint ,A.sDocExchangePolicy ,A.sDocValidPeriod FROM IRIS_DRM_CONFIG A WHERE A.drmpoliy = #{menuRole}
